Silly italians and your pasta cannons!

**Release 2 updates:**

**-Added FV101 Scorpion chassis**

**-Added FV101 Scorpion turrets, 76mm and 90mm versions**

**-Added Oto Melara 76mm Naval Autocannon**

**-Leviathan turret now consumes electricity**

**-Various tweaks**

**-Removed Kerbab**

So I'm stuck in a bit of indecision as to what to make next. I initially wanted to the gun off the M1128 stryker, but Spanner's already has that. I found something close to it though, the Falcon turret (wouldn't even have to make the rest of the tank, already have that):

![falcon14zm4.jpg](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1CZOWaVqQLM/UO9vC_JCXiI/AAAAAAAAqgA/3yt2xvxCLpU/s1600/falcon14zm4.jpg)

Buuuut, the Oto Melara worked out pretty well, and there aren't too many Naval guns around. I was thinking about perhaps a 40mm Autocannon for naval vessels as a less overpowered alternative:

![Bofors_40_Mk4_naval_gun_system_top.jpg](http://a403.idata.over-blog.com/4/22/09/08/UK-Indus-Def/Bae-Systems/40mm-Naval-Gun/Bofors_40_Mk4_naval_gun_system_top.jpg)

Anyone got any preferences?
Despite really wanting another cool tank turret, I think you should do another naval gun. Those look better on airships, and I think HL Airships is getting close to a 1.0.2 update.

one little request: add a "CrewCabin" property to all turrets^\_^. Actually I can do it for you if you want. It will be a very much great improve. Really. And if somebody teach me I may possibly be able to make an IVA for that. That will be a lot of fun.
